snippet.title: Sniper Elite V2 Remastered – 7 Reasons to Upgrade | PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Buy at Amazon (UK) – PS4/Xbox One/Nintendo Switch:  https://amzn.to/33dpUGH 
Buy at Amazon (USA) – PS4: https://amzn.to/2W20Lxh 
Buy at Amazon (USA) – Xbox One: https://amzn.to/2TX7INf 
Buy at Amazon (USA) – Nintendo Switch: https://amzn.to/38HavQj 

Sniper Elite V2 Remastered will bring 1945 Berlin to current platforms.

The 7 reasons to upgrade:

1. Incredible Remastered visuals
2. New frame-by-frame photo mode
3. New Playable characters
4. Optional 60fps performance mode*
5. All the DLC included free
6. Expanded 16-player multiplayer**
7. 4K & HDR support*

*On supported platforms

** Nintendo Switch supports 8 players online, plus 4 player local wifi

Follow us on:
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Mixer: https://mixer.com/rebellion_official 
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/sniperelitegame/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/SniperElite  
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion 
Rebellion Game Store: https://games.rebellionstore.com/



PEGI Unlisted
